threads.title: ## ✅ 1) Is Word Conversion *Really* Optional
threads.excerpt: **User:** Can you please clarify your recommendations regarding 1) the Word conversion and 2) the export to .docx? If I am committed to a high quality product for my users (which I am) is #1 really op

learnings.summary: Correction: com but not Word? If so, can we use Google Doc templates and add a step to download these to Word on
learnings.details:
com but not Word? If so, can we use Google Doc templates and add a step to download these to Word once filled, and another step to run a script that cleans up the formatting to avoid any nasty mismatches between Google and Word, and THEN save to lockable pdf? There's no value for the user to have an end product in their colours with text that doesn't align and dot points that display as hash tags and question marks!

**Assistant:** You’ve nailed the core problem, Carla — and yes, you’ve interpreted it spot on
